DataSource.Query: SELECT Name FROM Win32_ServerFeature WHERE ID = 296

DisplayString.Name: Windows Server Backup
DisplayString.Description:
This Management Pack discovers and monitors the Windows Server Backup Feature The MP supports Windows Server 2008R2 through at least Windows Server 2019
Developed by Kevin Holman https://github.com/thekevinholman/WindowsServerBackup

Last Backup Status Monitor
DisplayString.Description: Detects the last known backup status from the event log. Resets to healthy when Event ID 4 is detected.
